mapper.select: select (select code_info from tb_code where h.act_code = code_no) as act_name, connect_time, ip_addr, (select room_name from tb_room where h.room_no = room_no) as room_name, (select u.user_name from tb_user as u where u.user_no = h.user_no) as user_name, (select u.user_email from tb_user as u where u.user_no = h.user_no) as user_email from tb_history as h where room_no in (select room_no from tb_room where user_no = #{userNo}) order by connect_time desc;
